Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Technique: PRESSED IN A FORM/MODEL; ENAMELLED; PAINTED
Name: Mummiform shabti
Description: Mummiform shabti. The head, subsiding between the shoulders, is framed by a tripartite wig. A wesekh-collar has been painted in black on the chest.
